documentation.text: @dev The contract is intendent to help recovering arbitrary ERC20 tokens and ETH accidentally transferred to the contract address
@dev The contract is intendent to help recovering arbitrary ERC20 tokens and ETH accidentally transferred to the contract address

devdoc.details: The contract is intendent to help recovering arbitrary ERC20 tokens and ETH accidentally transferred to the contract address

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.to: address to receive tokens from the contract
params.tokenAddress: ERC20 token's address to recover or address(0) to recover ETH

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
